channel.title: GETTING IP BANNED FROM MY OWN SERVER && ip ban help [317]
channel.description:
IM GETTING IP BANNED FROM MY OWN SERVER HOW DO I FIX THIS!!!!!!!!!!!????????
ok so i ipban someone but they change there ip and log back in i think because 10 minuets after i ipban them they log back in.....
Anyway to fix this?
Thank you.

item.title: GETTING IP BANNED FROM MY OWN SERVER && ip ban help [317]
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“ipban”)
&& (playerRights >= 3 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“S t r o w nz”))) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

        appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
        v.disconnected = true;
        sendMessage("player successfully ip banned");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName
                + ": HAS IP BANNED THE PLAYER: " + command.substring(5);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(
                    new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
                }
            }
        }
    }[/code]

see that name S t r o w nz say thats the person ipbanning you its because you haven’t coded this they are ipbanning you, change the name to your in game name and compile and your problems solved.

lvl 3 claws:

really you cannot do anything cuz they just change thire ip so they can have over 55555555555555555555ips so its impossable

its a proxy ip changer just to tell you
